testng-results:
STEP 1
Open url 'http://qa5.publisher7.com'.
Enter 'admin@publisher.nbcuni.com' in the 'Email Address' text box.
Enter 'pa55word' in the 'Password' text box.
Click the 'Login' button.
<<<<<<< HEAD SETUP
Mouse over the 'Configuration' menu link.
Mouse over the 'Media' menu link.
Click the 'Media: thePlatform mpx settings' menu link.
Switch to the active frame titled 'Media: thePlatform mpx settings dialog'.
Get all the selected import account options and store to a list.
STEP 2
Click the 'Close Overlay X'.
Scroll by '-500'.
Mouse over the 'Structure' menu link.
Click the 'File types' menu link.
Switch to the active frame titled 'File types dialog'.
STEP 3
Click the 'DB TV manage fields' link.
Switch to the active frame titled 'MPX Video for Account "DB TV" (2312945284) dialog'.
STEP 4
Switch to the active frame titled 'MPX Video for Account "DB TV" (2312945284) dialog'.
STEP 6
Click the 'Close Overlay X'.
Scroll by '-500'.
Mouse over the 'Structure' menu link.
Click the 'File types' menu link.
Switch to the active frame titled 'File types dialog'.
STEP 7
Click the 'DB TV edit file type' link.
Switch to the active frame titled 'MPX Video for Account "DB TV" (2312945284) dialog'.
Select 'MPX Media Related Link' from the 'URL Alias Field' drop down list.
Click the 'Save' button.
Verify success message of 'has been updated.' is present.
STEP 8 NOTE- step 8 creates a new video with a canonical url rather than using an existing video
Open the mpx platform.
Click the 'Upload' button.
Click the 'Choose Files' button.
Click the 'Movies' button in the OS Upload dialog.
Click the Test Movie in th OS Upload dialog.
Click the 'Open' button.
Click the 'Upload' button in the Upload dialog.
Enter 'Automation5722d90f30' in the 'Title' text box.
Enter 'canonicalurlcdf7fdf79c' in the 'Canonical URL' text box.
Click the 'Save' button.
Click the 'Publish' button.
Click the 'Publish to Pub 7 Primary' check box.
Click the 'Publish' button from the upload dialog.
STEP 9
Open url 'http://qa5.publisher7.com'.
STEP 10 ======= Mouse over the 'Content' menu link.
Mouse over the 'Add content' menu link.
Click the 'Post' menu link.
Switch to the active frame titled 'Create Post dialog'.
Verify the 'Title' is present as a required field.
Verify the 'Body' is present as a required field.
Scroll the 'Publishing Options' link into view.
Click the 'Publishing Options' link.
Verify the 'Moderation State' is present as a required field.
Scroll to and click the 'Basic Information' tab.
Enter 'dc215939567d44a' in the 'Title' text box.
Switch to the Synopsis frame.
Enter a randomized text string into the 'Body' text area.
Switch to the active frame titled 'Create Post dialog'.
Select the 'WYSIWYG Mini' from the 'Text format' drop down list.
Click the 'Cover' select button.
Switch to the select file frame.
Enter the file path for file upload.
Click the 'Upload' button.
Wait for the file link to be visible after upload.
Click the 'Next' button.
Click the 'Public Local Files' radio button.
Click the 'Next' button.
Verify the file image 'HanSolo' is present.
Verify the img is loaded and visible.
Click the 'Save' button.
Switch to the active frame titled 'Create Post dialog'.
Scroll the 'Publishing Options' link into view.
Click the 'Publishing Options' link.
Select 'Draft' from the 'Moderation State' drop down list.
Click the 'Save' button.
Verify success message of 'Post dc215939567d44a has been created.' is present.
Verify the text 'Draft' is present in the work bench info block.
